price: Yoo qamiisni isaa gara duubaatiin baqaqfame, isheen ni sobdee inni dhugaa dubbattoota irraayi.”
arabic: وَإِن كَانَ قَمِيصُهُۥ قُدَّ مِن دُبُرٖ فَكَذَبَتۡ وَهُوَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-in kāna qamīṣuhu qudda min duburin fakadhabat wahuwa mina al-ṣādiqīna
